description: Dashboard showing Prometheus Alertmanager metrics for observing status of the cluster and possible debbuging.

panels.description: Start time of the process since unix epoch in seconds.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Timestamp of the last successful configuration reload.
panels.title: Last Config Reload

panels.description: Current number of active alerts.
panels.title: Active Alerts

panels.description: The total number of received alerts that are firing
panels.title: Firing Alerts/sec

panels.description: The total number of received alerts that are resolved in the time range
panels.title: Resolved Alerts

panels.description: Current number of suppressed alerts.
panels.title: Suppressed Alerts

panels.description: Indicates whether the clustering is enabled or not.
panels.title: Clustering Enabled

panels.description: Number of configured receivers
panels.title: Integrations Receivers

panels.description: Number of configured integrations.
panels.title: Integrations Configured

panels.description: Whether the last configuration reload attempt was successful.
panels.title: Last Config Reload Successful

panels.description: Current number of active silences.
panels.title: Active Silences

panels.description: The total number of received alerts that were invalid.
panels.title: Invalid Alerts

panels.description: Total number of times an HTTP request failed because the concurrency limit was reached.
panels.title: HTTP Request Limit Exceeded

panels.description: Number of notification log queries were received and errored.
panels.title: Notification Log Queries

panels.description: Duration of notification log query evaluation.
panels.title: Nflog Query Evaluation Latency

panels.description: Duration of notification log query evaluation.
panels.title: Nflog Query Evaluation Latency -  Percentiles

panels.description: Duration of the last notification log snapshot.
panels.title: Nflog Snapshot Duration

panels.description: Duration of the last notification log garbage collection cycle.
panels.title: Notification Log GC Time

panels.description: The total number of attempted notifications.
panels.title: $integration - Total Requests Attempted

panels.description: The total number of attempted notification requests and failed requests
panels.title: $integration - Total Requests / Failures

panels.description: The latency of notifications in seconds.
panels.title: $integration - Notification Latency Heatmap

panels.description: The latency of notifications in seconds.
panels.title: $integration - Notification Latency Percentiles

panels.description: Duration of silence query evaluation.
panels.title: Silence Query Latency

panels.description: Duration of silence query evaluation.
panels.title: Silence Query Latency - Percentiles

panels.description: How many silence queries were received and failed
panels.title: Silence Queries/sec

panels.description: Duration of the last silence snapshot.
panels.title: Silences Snapshot Duration

panels.description: Duration of the last silence garbage collection cycle.
panels.title: Silences GC Time

panels.description: Number of alerts by state such as `active`, `suppressed` etc.
panels.title: Active Alerts

panels.description: Number of received alerts from Prometheus by status `firing` on positive axis and `resolved` on negative axis.
panels.title: Received alerts by status

panels.description: Current number of suppressed alerts.
panels.title: Suppressed Alerts

panels.description: Summary of latencies for the processing of alerts.
panels.title: Alert Processing Latency

panels.description: Number of active aggregation groups
panels.title: Aggregation Groups

panels.description:
Shows cluster score representing cluster health. From Hashicorps official documentation: 
> This metric describes a node's perception of its own health based on how well it is meeting the soft real-time requirements of the protocol. This metric ranges from 0 to 8, where 0 indicates "totally healthy".

For more info see https://www.consul.io/docs/agent/telemetry.html#cluster-health
panels.title: Clusterhealth score

panels.description: Shows gossip cluster members count in time and failing peers in case of any in red color.
panels.title: Cluster members count

panels.description: On positive axis is number of attempts to reconnect the cluster. On negative axis if number of failed attempts.
panels.title: Cluster reconnections

panels.description: On positive axis shows number of peers that joined the cluster and on negative axis number of peers that left the cluster.
panels.title: Cluster peers left/joined

panels.description: On positive axis is size of sent cluster messages by type `update`  or `full_state` and on negative axis the same for received messages.
panels.title: Cluster messages size

panels.description: On positive axis is number of sent cluster messages by type `update`  or `full_state` and on negative axis the same for received messages.
panels.title: Cluster messages count

panels.description: On positive axis is number of queued cluster messages and on negative axis number of pruned messages.
panels.title: Cluster messages queue

panels.description: Histogram of latencies for HTTP requests.
panels.title: $handler - Request Times

panels.description: Histogram of latencies for HTTP requests.
panels.title: $handler - Request Duration Percentiles

panels.description: Histogram of response size for HTTP requests.
panels.title: $handler - Request Size

panels.description: Histogram of response size for HTTP requests.
panels.title: $handler - Response Size Percentiles

panels.description: Number of received gossip messages that have been further gossiped.
panels.title: Notification Log Received  Gossip Messages

panels.description: Total user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
panels.title: Process CPU Usage

panels.description: Number of open file descriptors.
panels.title: Open File Descriptors

panels.description: Number of open file descriptors / Maximum number of open file descriptors
panels.title: FD Utilization

panels.description: Resident memory size in bytes.
panels.title: Process Resident Memory

panels.description: Virtual memory size in bytes.
panels.title: Process Virtual Memory

panels.description: Start time of the process since unix epoch in seconds.
panels.title: Process Uptime

panels.description: Total number of connections attempted by the given dialer a given name.
panels.title: net_conntrack_dialer_conn_attempted_total

panels.description: Total number of connections closed which originated from the dialer of a given name.
panels.title: net_conntrack_dialer_conn_closed_total

panels.description: Total number of connections successfully established by the given dialer a given name.
panels.title: net_conntrack_dialer_conn_established_total

panels.description: Total number of connections failed to dial by the dialer a given name.
panels.title: net_conntrack_dialer_conn_failed_total

panels.description:
Total number of connections opened to the listener of a given name.

Total number of connections closed that were made to the listener of a given name.
panels.title: Listener Accepted and Closed Connections

title: Alertmanager Overview
